n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

x_set = set(x)

min_houses = len(x_set)

if 1 in x_set:
    min_houses -= 1
if n in x_set:
    min_houses -= 1

max_houses = len(x_set)

if 1 in x_set and n in x_set:
    max_houses -= 1

print(min_houses, max_houses)

# SOLUTION

n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

x.sort()

cnt = 1
for i in range(1, n):
    if x[i] != x[i-1]:
        cnt += 1

print(cnt, cnt+n)

n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

x_min = [0] * n
x_max = [0] * n

for i in range(n):
    if i == 0:
        x_min[i] = x[i] - 1
        x_max[i] = x[i] + 1
    else:
        x_min[i] = min(x[i] - 1, x[i] - x[i-1])
        x_max[i] = max(x[i] + 1, x[i] + (n - x[i-1]))

print(len(set(x_min)), len(set(x_max)))

# SOLUTION

n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

x_set = set(x)

print(min(len(x_set), n - len(x_set)), max(len(x_set), n - len(x_set)))
